name: TurtleHack
description:
TurtleHack development started mid-September and has been my primary focus up until its version 1 release. It was a wild 12 weeks of intense development.

This is not an early access game and it is unlikely that I will be able to give it my full attention moving forward. That said I do still plan on expanding the content and fixing bugs as I find them.

I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it.
- Ben.

Credits
